title: Ticket #2001: vm_gahp leaks fd on script callout
description:
Every time the vm-gahp does a call-out to interact with the vm software but doesn't provide any input for the script, it leaks the pipe descriptor it would have used to write the input to the script.

In unusual error cases, additional file descriptors will be leaked as well.
